channel.title: Object variables
channel.description: Well guys this is a list I have been working on basically my aim was to try and find out what these things did: anIntArray773 = null;//Model Id of Object anIntArray776 = null;//Type of object e.g 10 for normal 0 - 3 for Walls etc. aString739 = null;//Name of object aByteArray777 = null;//Examine information anIntArray784 = null;//Crashes the client if you change so unsure anIntArray747 = null;//Not quite sure about this one anInt744 = 1;//Size anInt761 = 1;//Size aBoolean767 = true;//Whether or not you can walk on the object aBoolean757 = true;//Nothing aBoolean778 = false;//Whether or not it is right clickable aBoolean762 = false;//as far as i can tell does nothing aBoolean769 = false;//If true the object is pitch black aBoolean764 = false;//As Far as i can tell does nothing anInt781 = -1;//Unknown anInt775 = 16;//Unknown aByte737 = 0;//Unknown aByte742 = 0;//Unknown aStringArray786 = null;//A clicking option for object anInt746 = -1;//Unknown anInt758 = -1;//Unknown aBoolean751 = false;//Does nothing supposedly aBoolean779 = true;//Stupid boring things not doing anything anInt748 = 128;//Unknown anInt772 = 128;//Unknown anInt740 = 128;//Unknown anInt768 = 0;//Unknown anInt738 = 0;//Unknown anInt745 = 0;//Unknown anInt783 = 0;//Unknown aBoolean736 = false;//If true when u walk to an object facing south to it you walk round to the side aBoolean766 = false;//Boring :( anInt760 = -1;//Unknown anInt774 = -1;//Unknown anInt749 = -1;//Unknown anIntArray759 = null;//Crashes the client if you change As you can see I have found out a few of them and I hope them to be helpful but if you know any of these I would love your input and if you use these please post as well. I teseted all the booleans and the Arrays. I havent got to testing the ints yet.

item.title: Object variables
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Yes there most definately is and i think you are right i would love it if you found out what they were XD because at the moment things like normal walls are just black blocks because u have to set a texture to them.
Im intending on setting this up for items and npcs as well and hoping people will contribute i wonder if the mods can make it so more than one person can edit a topic…

Read full topic

item.title: Object variables
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Here. I have an idea…

aBoolean769 = false;//If true the object is pitch black
That probably indicates if the object uses a texture. Then there's probably an integer specifying the texture ID, and then a boolean that indicates if it animates.

Read full topic

item.title: Object variables
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

The only things I know how todo with a Server is Changeing the Home, lower/highering Bonus, change an object, remove an object, add an item/remove an item… those things, thats why I really need to learn more but im not sure how

Read full topic

item.title: Object variables
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Well guys this is a list I have been working on basically my aim was to try and find out what these things did:
anIntArray773 = null;//Model Id of Object
anIntArray776 = null;//Type of object e.g 10 for normal 0 - 3 for Walls etc.
aString739 = null;//Name of object
aByteArray777 = null;//Examine information
anIntArray784 = null;//Crashes the client if you change so unsure
anIntArray747 = null;//Not quite sure about this one
anInt744 = 1;//Size
anInt761 = 1;//Size
aBoolean767 = true;//Whether or not you can walk on the object
aBoolean757 = true;//Nothing
aBoolean778 = false;//Whether or not it is right clickable
aBoolean762 = false;//as far as i can tell does nothing
aBoolean769 = false;//If true the object is pitch black
aBoolean764 = false;//As Far as i can tell does nothing
anInt781 = -1;//Unknown
anInt775 = 16;//Unknown
aByte737 = 0;//Unknown
aByte742 = 0;//Unknown
aStringArray786 = null;//A clicking option for object
anInt746 = -1;//Unknown
anInt758 = -1;//Unknown
aBoolean751 = false;//Does nothing supposedly
aBoolean779 = true;//Stupid boring things not doing anything
anInt748 = 128;//Unknown
anInt772 = 128;//Unknown
anInt740 = 128;//Unknown
anInt768 = 0;//Unknown
anInt738 = 0;//Unknown
anInt745 = 0;//Unknown
anInt783 = 0;//Unknown
aBoolean736 = false;//If true when u walk to an object facing south to it you walk round to the side
aBoolean766 = false;//Boring
anInt760 = -1;//Unknown
anInt774 = -1;//Unknown
anInt749 = -1;//Unknown
anIntArray759 = null;//Crashes the client if you change
As you can see I have found out a few of them and I hope them to be helpful but if you know any of these I would love your input and if you use these please post as well. I teseted all the booleans and the Arrays. I havent got to testing the ints yet.

Read full topic
